name: Mystery gift box
description:
An old fella left you a bunch of surprise gifts. He said he left you an extra cool one at the end of the road.

Game made in 48 hours for Yogscast Game Jam 2020.

Controls: Space or left mouse button to jump, hold it to jump higher. R to restart the level.

Credits:

Art and sounds by Kenney (Kenney.nl)
Music by pixelsphere.org  / The Cynic Project (cynicmusic.com)
